ygData.subject: job opening
ygData.msgSnippet: just saw this on casters realm I hope one of us gets the job. POSITIONS VACANT As a result of people moving on in their Everquest lives we have lost two of our
ygData.messageBody:
just saw this on casters realm I hope one of us gets the job.
POSITIONS VACANT
As a result of people moving on in their Everquest lives we have lost two of
our site administrators. In order to keep the site running as smoothly as
possible, and to facilitate growth in some other areas, we now have a number
of positions available. Current positions include:
* Trade Skill Administrator
* Bard Administrator
* Cleric Administrator
* Necromancer Administrator
Applicants should be extremely knowledgeable in their field, and preferably
understand basic HTML (although not essential). Apply via email to
baelish@... <mailto:baelish@...>.






<http://i.winfire.com/s/isapiEng.dll/wf.exe?cmd=rl&508,120050257&wf.exe>




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
